newsitem.title: USA: FileNet Corp sees 4Q share down.
newsitem.headline: FileNet Corp sees 4Q share down.

text.p: FileNet Corp said on Thursday it expects fourth quarter revenue will be about $73 million against $67.7 million in the same quarter last year.
Net income will be about $0.20 per share compared with $0.32 last year, the company said.
FileNet said the results are preliminary and subject to its year-end audit.
Revenues and earnings were hurt by a number of customers either delaying their orders or, in some cases, reducing the size of orders late in the quarter, a statement issued by FileNet said.
Revenue for the whole of 1996 year will be about $269 million compared with $229 million last year, the company said.

Net income before one-time after-tax charges for merger, restructuring and write-off of purchased in-process research and development costs will be about $0.82 per share for 1996, compared to $0.83 per share last year, the company said.
